attributes.action: Abolish the Road Fund license and the need for road charging and put the tax onto fuel so those who use more fuel pay more.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair that people are discriminated against by the size of car they have. If road tax were abolished and the duty put onto the fuel the system would be much fairer and would also mean there would be no need for road charging.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
